name: manifest
description: Manifest is a self-hosted manifest generator used for build pipelines and package release management. It provides developers a consistent framework for producing metadata across multi-project builds.
features: Manifest generation: Automatically create build manifests with version, dependencies, and metadata.
Multi-project support: Manage manifests across multiple projects from a centralized interface.
Version tracking: Record build versions, timestamps, and commit hashes for release management.
Dependency mapping: Document project dependencies and their versions in structured format.
Template system: Use customizable templates to standardize manifest structure across projects.
CI/CD integration: Generate manifests as part of automated build pipelines and workflows.
Export formats: Output manifests in JSON, YAML, or custom formats for different tools.
Change history: Track modifications to manifests over time with version control integration.
Validation rules: Ensure manifest completeness and correctness with configurable validation.
API access: Programmatically generate and retrieve manifests through REST API endpoints.
